header: How would you like to be contacted?
p: We may contact you if we need further information.

overseas.p: We’ll call you to confirm some of the details you’ve given us before we process your application.

checkbox.legend: How would you like to be contacted?
checkbox.hint: You must provide at least one phone number.

errors.required: Select at least one phone number we can contact you on.

errors.format: Home phone number must only contain numbers and spaces.
errors.length: Home phone number must be 70 characters or less.

mobileTelephoneNumber.label: Mobile phone number
mobileTelephoneNumber.hint: We may use text messages to update you about your claim.

errors.format: Mobile phone number must only contain numbers and spaces.
errors.length: Mobile phone number must be 70 characters or less.

errors.format: Work phone number must only contain numbers and spaces.
errors.length: Work phone number must be 70 characters or less.

email.label: Email address
email.hint: We'll use this to confirm we've received your application.

errors.format: Enter an email address in the correct format, like name@example.com.
errors.length: Email address must be 100 characters or less.
